about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: KC Information is committed to providing the most professional IT system services
about.companyDesc1: KC Information was established years ago, focusing on providing enterprise-level IT system solutions. We have an experienced professional team dedicated to helping clients improve operational efficiency, reduce costs, and maintain competitive advantages in the digital age.
about.companyDesc2: Our service scope covers hotel management systems, enterprise resource planning systems, customized software development, and more. We have successfully served over 100 enterprise clients and received high recognition from the industry.
about.professionalDesc: Professional technical team with rich industry experience
about.integrityDesc: Building long-term partnerships based on integrity
about.innovationDesc: Continuous innovation to provide the best solutions
about.qualityDesc: Insisting on high-quality products and services
about.teamDesc: We have a professional team composed of senior engineers, project managers, and system analysts. Each member has rich practical experience and professional certifications, dedicated to providing the highest quality service to clients. We believe that an excellent team is the foundation of providing outstanding service.

mobilePOS.title: Mobile Device - Mobile POS Successfully Launched
mobilePOS.excerpt: After extensive effort and countless communications and tests between engineers and clients, the customized system meets the needs of chain restaurants. Through scheduled restaurant service operation drills, we repeatedly adjusted the program flow and operations. KC Information always provides opportunities to participate in customer service, gaining on-site and store development perspectives to face challenges.
mobilePOS.content:
Real-time ordering and instant order delivery on-site, quick table service, online connectivity, saving time and labor costs, helping customers develop systems that coordinate with their workflows.

Simultaneously upgrading customer experience, saving time and computing resources.

siteminder.title: Integration with Global Hospitality Channel Manager Siteminder - Uninterrupted Order Flow
siteminder.excerpt: After countless tests and improvements, the bidirectional integration service with Siteminder is officially launched. One-stop data entry saves staff from repetitive tasks like matching, filing, uploading, and correcting, ensuring uninterrupted service.
siteminder.content:
KC Information adheres to the principle of 'using simple tools to simplify complex data,' working together with major industry players to create a more convenient working environment for Taiwan's hospitality industry.

Through deep integration with Siteminder, hotel operators can:
- Manage all booking channels in one place
- Real-time synchronization of room availability and pricing
- Automated order processing workflow
- Reduce manual error rates
- Improve overall operational efficiency

memberSystem.title: New Member Management System Officially Released
memberSystem.excerpt: The new member management system provides more comprehensive member management functions, including intelligent recommendations, automated marketing, consumption analysis, and other advanced features.
memberSystem.content:
Main updates to the new member management system:
- AI intelligent recommendation engine
- Automated marketing tools
- In-depth consumer behavior analysis
- Multi-channel member integration
- Mobile membership card functionality
